content: Hey Chris, I just wanted to say that I’m not against the ethics or the core of your company (like most of these comments). This idea is deceptively amazing and most of the negativity here stems from the “mass-producing” part, which you stated you are NOT doing. I liken this to Etsy, and I’d say that this company is even MORE personalized since it touches on a very personal item: photographs. I know I’m really late, but I just wanted to say that not everyone on the Internet hates your idea. I think it’s amazing.
